title: Nationwide
meta_description: A visual helper for the 7 requirements needed for a Nationwide Insurance password on their website and mobile apps.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Must be between 7 and 30 characters in length
Must contain 3 of these: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
Cannot use any of these special characters: ^ & * ( ) < > " ' %
Cannot solely consist of basic sequential characters (aaa, 111)

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Passwords are case sensitive, common phrases may be flagged when resetting your password.
